item.description:
Let's get a little taste of the warmth of the Cape Verdean Islands by visiting a fun and friendly bar in Providence, Rhode Island.

Join us for some Portuguese conversation and live Cape Verdean Music. Food is also available on the premises from time to time, but there are lots of places to choose from close by and they will direct us once we are there.

 

LIVE Cape Verdean music begins at 9pm.

 

Please add a comment if you are interested in carpooling.

 

Please answer the RSVP questions, so that we can adjust the meetup time, if needed.

 

Looking forward to seeing you!
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet at the bar and then depending on whether or not they have food that night we can walk to a place near by.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Road trip: Cape Verde via Providence, RI
